projects.title: Autonomous Delivery Drone
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered autonomous drone for last-mile delivery with obstacle avoidance
projects.longDescription: A fully autonomous delivery drone system that uses computer vision and machine learning for navigation, obstacle detection, and safe package delivery. The drone can fly up to 10km range and carry payloads of up to 2kg with real-time tracking capabilities.

projects.title: Humanoid Robot - NITP BOT
projects.shortDescription: Advanced humanoid robot capable of walking, object recognition, and basic interactions
projects.longDescription: A bipedal humanoid robot with 20 degrees of freedom, equipped with stereo cameras for vision and AI algorithms for object recognition and human interaction. The robot can walk on uneven surfaces, recognize faces, and perform basic tasks through voice commands.

projects.title: Smart Agriculture Robot
projects.shortDescription: Autonomous robot for precision agriculture with soil analysis and weed detection
projects.longDescription: An autonomous ground robot equipped with multispectral cameras and sensors for soil analysis, weed detection, and crop health monitoring. The robot can navigate through crop rows autonomously and provide real-time data to farmers via a mobile application.

projects.title: Autonomous Underwater Vehicle
projects.shortDescription: ROV for underwater exploration and data collection in marine environments
projects.longDescription: A remotely operated underwater vehicle designed for marine research and exploration. Equipped with HD cameras, sonar, and environmental sensors, the AUV can dive up to 50 meters and transmit real-time video and sensor data to the surface station.

projects.title: Swarm Robotics Platform
projects.shortDescription: Multi-robot system for cooperative tasks using swarm intelligence algorithms
projects.longDescription: A platform consisting of 10 identical small robots that can work cooperatively using swarm intelligence algorithms. The system demonstrates collective behaviors like pattern formation, object transportation, and area coverage through local communication between robots.

projects.title: Assistive Robotic Arm
projects.shortDescription: 6-DOF robotic arm for assistive applications with EMG control interface
projects.longDescription: A 6-degree-of-freedom robotic arm designed to assist people with mobility challenges. The arm can be controlled through multiple interfaces including EMG signals, voice commands, and a mobile app. It features force feedback and object recognition capabilities.
